segments.text: Our advertisement says English competence is a key requirement of this position . Then how do you think of your proficiency in written and spoken English ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I have learned English for 10 years , and I have passed College English Test Band 4 and 6.My spoken English is fairly good enough to express myself fluently .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What other foreign language do you speak ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I did self-study of Japanese in college , and I can carry on some simple conversations in Japanese .
segments.speaker: S2
